Casual: 上野きました
Words: I'm in Ueno

Casual: 外で撮るセナは初めてじゃない？
Words: Isn't this the first time you've taken pictures of Senna outside?

Casual: 恥ずかしいですか
Words: Are you embarrassed?

Casual: 初ロケです
Words: First time on location

Casual: 今日どこ行きますか
Words: Where should we go today?

Casual: 上野には飲み屋さんがたくさんあって
Words: There are a lot of bars in Ueno

Casual: 韓国にはあんまないと思うんですけど
Words: I don't think there are many in Korea

Casual: 確かに立ち飲み屋って概念ここ来て学んだわ
Words: I learned the concept of standing bars when I came here

Casual: 上野お昼はら飲める
Words: I'd like to introduce a standing bar in Ueno where you can drink

Casual: 立ち飲み屋さんを紹介したい思います
Words: I'd like to introduce you to some standing bars in Ueno where you can drink from noon

Casual: 一軒目
Words: First house

Casual: 行ったことがある場所？
Words: Have you been into this place?

Casual: もちろん
Words: Of course!

Casual: 大山紹介したいです
Words: I'd like to introduce Oyama

Casual: ここで買って後ろの方で食べながら飲めます
Words: You can buy food here and drink it while eating in the back!

Casual: まず上野に来たらここでビルを飲む
Words: If you're ever in Ueno, this is the place to drink Bill!

Casual: ビルはいくらなの
Words: How much is a bill?

Casual: 中が400円か
Words: 400 yen for the inside?

Words: Yummy Menchi and Yummy Croquette!

Words: Two medium draft beers, please

Words: This is my first glass of Chang

Casual: こういう立ち飲み屋って日本に多いの
Words: There are a lot of standing bars like this in Japan

Casual: こういうソースもある
Words: There's a source like this, too

Casual: 新宿にもちょっとあるじゃん？　立ち飲み屋
Words: There are some in Shinjuku, right?　A standing bar

Casual: 行ったことある?
Words: Have you been there?

Casual: あの時一緒だったじゃん?
Words: Didn't we go together that time?

Casual: 不思議な傘持って来た時
Words: When I came with the strange umbrella

Casual: 傘の中に面白い傘あるでしょう
Words: There's a funny umbrella inside, right?

Casual: 反対側にやれるやつとか
Words: You know, the kind you can put on the other side?

Casual: それ持ってきてた
Words: I brought that

Casual: 何？その思い出
Words: What? That memory

Casual: 「この傘やばいな？」と思ってた
Words: I was thinking, "What the hell is wrong with this umbrella? I thought

Casual: それで思い出せないんだけど
Words: And I can't remember

Casual: あるって
Words: You do?

Casual: あるか
Words: You do?

Casual: こういうことセナしか好きじゃないから
Words: Senna's the only one who likes this kind of thing

Words: You said you didn't have anyone to go with

Casual: 何だと思ってるんだ
Words: What do you think it is?

Casual: 思い出せないの？マジで？
Words: You can't remember? Seriously?

Casual: 高いお店
Words: It's expensive

Casual: わかる？
Words: You know what I mean?

Casual: 俺の問題？
Words: Is that my problem?

Casual: 今韓国語なのか？日本語なのか？わかんなくて
Words: Are you speaking Korean right now? Or is it Japanese? I don't know

Casual: グッチね？はい
Words: Gucci, right? Yeah

Casual: 日本語でグッチです
Words: Gucci in Japanese

Casual: お店あるんじゃん
Words: There's a store, right?

Casual: そこを渡ってそのまま歩いたら
Words: Cross the street and keep walking

Casual: その立ち飲み屋みたいなところが出ますよ
Words: You'll see a place that looks like a bar

Casual: どこ？　新宿？
Words: Where?　Shinjuku?

Casual: ちっと行ったかもね？昔
Words: I've been there a while. A long time ago

Casual: けっこう前だよね
Words: That was a long time ago

Casual: 一年以上じゃない？
Words: It's been over a year

Casual: もっと安いよりは
Words: More than cheap

Casual: 簡単に飲めるっていうのが強いね？
Words: It's easier to get a drink than cheaper, right?

Casual: でもちょっとお店よりは若干安い
Words: But it's a little cheaper than the store

Casual: 若干小ちゃいしね？
Words: It's a little smaller

Casual: 日本で言うとチャージ？
Words: In Japan, there's a charge

Casual: お通し代っていうのがかかるから
Words: In Japan, you have to pay an appetizer fee

Casual: それがないじゃん
Words: You don't have that

Casual: 座らないから
Words: You don't have to sit down

Words: You pay for a chair

Casual: だから1人で「今日飲みたい」とか思う時って
Words: So if you're alone and want to have a drink today..

Casual: 4人掛けのテーブル部に案内されて座るのも（ちょっと）
Words: I don't want to be shown to a table for four and sit at it

Casual: 仕事終わってサクッと飲んで帰れるかなって
Words: I thought I could have a quick drink after work and go home

Casual: こういうものないよね？　韓国って
Words: You don't have anything like this, right?　Korea

Casual: でもさ立って食べるってことはあるじゃん
Words: But there is such a thing as eating standing up

Casual: それ専用のお店はないわ
Words: We don't have a dedicated restaurant for that

Casual: そうだね
Words: That's true

Casual: やっぱ韓国人カッツリ飲みたいかな？
Words: Do you think Koreans like to drink hard?

Casual: 座ってから飲むのことが多いかな
Words: We tend to sit down and drink

Casual: 1人飲みってものあんま少ないしね？日本よりは
Words: There's not much room for drinking alone, right? More than in Japan

Casual: 日本はちょいちょいあるじゃん
Words: In Japan, there's a little bit of that

Casual: 日本人は好きなんで1人
Words: Japanese people like to drink alone

Casual: 1人が好きですか
Words: You like to drink alone?

Casual: せなはもう..
Words: Sena is..

Casual: めっちゃ寂しい動物じゃない？セナって
Words: Isn't she a very lonely animal? Senna?

Casual: セナは人が集まることが好き
Words: Senna likes to be around people

Casual: でもたまにはけっこう1人飲みする
Words: But sometimes, she drinks alone

Casual: 1人飲みしたらちょっと寂しくなる感じしない？
Words: Doesn't it make you feel a little lonely when you drink alone?

Casual: 俺はめっちゃするんだけど
Words: I get lonely a lot

Casual: いや一人で考えたりとか
Words: No, I think alone

Casual: クラシックとか流れて？
Words: Is there classical music playing?

Casual: ウィスキーでしょう
Words: Whiskey, right?

Casual: 一人の時ほど友達ができたりもするじゃん
Words: You make more friends when you're alone

Casual: 普段喋らない人とかと
Words: People you don't usually talk to

Casual: 確かにここで喋るんだ
Words: You're right, we do talk here

Casual: そういうこと好きだな？
Words: You like that, don't you?

Casual: 日本語勉強するのにもおいいかもよ
Words: It's a good place to learn Japanese

Casual: レベルが高すぎじゃない？
Words: Isn't it too high level?

Casual: おいしかった！
Words: That was delicious!

Casual: これで移動するの？
Words: Are we moving on from this?

Casual: 二軒目行きます
Words: I'm going to the second one

Casual: さっきのとこでどのぐらいいたかわかります
Words: Let's see how long we've been here

Casual: 一軒のとこで7分間いた
Words: I was there for seven minutes at one place

Casual: コロッケも食べてビールも飲めました
Words: I ate some falafel and drank some beer

Casual: これがはしご酒立ち飲み屋さんの
Words: This is what I like about drinking at a bar

Casual: いいとこなんで
Words: This is the best part of standing bars

Casual: セナが上野来るとまずお肉とビール飲んで
Words: Whenever Senna comes to Ueno, the first thing he does is eat meat and drink beer.

Casual: 勢いでっていうか元気つけて
Words: I mean, he drinks beer and meat to get his energy up.

Casual: お肉食べたら魚！
Words: After meat, fish!
